name: Procarol 25 mcg|5 ml syrup
description: Procaterol is a medication used to treat shortness of breath, coughing and wheezing caused by lung diseases such as asthma, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, emphysema, and bronchitis. Controlling these symptoms can allow you to spend lesser time off from normal everyday activities. Procaterol is a member of the bronchodilator class of medicines and is beta-2 adrenergic receptor agonist. It relaxes the muscles surrounding the airways, allowing them to expand and you to breathe more easily.
label: medicine
